title: Five-Star Grand Opening: Secluded Clifftop Haven for Adults Only
description: Imagine an idealistic world where luxurious seclusion meets unsurpassed natural beauty; where unbroken ocean views meet some of the freshest locally sourced produce; and where you can truly escape without a worry in the world. Welcome to the brand new Marina Cove Boutique Luxury Accommodation - located on a spectacular clifftop in one of New Zealand’s highest-rated leisure destinations: the Bay of Islands. Enjoy an ultra-luxe getaway for two or four people with a daily continental breakfast, welcome platter of New Zealand cheese and chocolate, welcome bottle of wine and a guaranteed late 12pm checkout to make the most of your final morning.
offer_address: 7 English Bay Rd, Opua 0200, New Zealand

title: Ocean-View Bay of Islands Luxury Apartment Stay with Daily Gourmet Breakfast
description:
Imagine a place where luxurious seclusion meets unsurpassed natural beauty, unbroken ocean views are complemented by the freshest, locally sourced produce, and you can truly escape without a worry in the world - welcome to Marina Cove Boutique Luxury Accommodation. This top-rated hotel is located on a spectacular clifftop in one of New Zealand’s most beloved destinations, the stunning Bay of Islands.

Utterly peaceful and totally secluded, with spectacular 180-degree views towards the bay's unspoilt 144 islands from a private furnished deck, your self-contained apartment is hard to leave - but there are plenty of white-sand beaches, scenic cruises, big-game fishing spots, picturesque walks and historic sites, if you're so inclined.
offer_address: 7 English Bay Rd, Opua 0200, New Zealand

title: Bay of Islands Secluded Clifftop Haven for up to Four People with Daily Breakfast
description:
Imagine a world where luxurious seclusion meets unsurpassed natural beauty, where unbroken ocean views meet some of the freshest, locally-sourced produce, and where you can truly escape without a worry in the world. Welcome to Marina Cove - located on a spectacular clifftop in one of New Zealand’s most beloved destinations: the Bay of Islands. Enjoy a self-contained apartment escape for two with daily continental breakfast, a selection of gourmet local produce and snacks, a welcome bottle of wine from the Bay of Islands vineyards, complimentary Wi-Fi and secure car parking.

**Travelling with a group?** Check out the Two-Bedroom upgrade, valid for up to four people.
offer_address: 7 English Bay Rd, Opua 0200, New Zealand

title: Once-in-a-Lifetime Group Luxury in New Zealand's Spectacular Bay of Islands
description: Nestled on the coast in New Zealand’s breathtaking Bay of Islands is The Landing, a 1,000-acre property with six private beaches, an award-winning vineyard, verdant wetlands and four very exclusive and unique residences, visited by former US President Barack Obama in 2018. All offering stunning views, these dream holiday homes are perfect for groups from four to eight people. Your unforgettable escape includes daily breakfast provisions, a decadent cheese platter, daily The Landing wine and much more.
offer_address: 623 Rangihoua Road, Purerua Peninsula, Bay of Islands 0294, New Zealand

title: Bay of Islands: Once-in-a-Lifetime Group Luxury
description: Nestled on the coast in New Zealand’s breathtaking Bay of Islands is The Landing, a 1,000-acre property with six private beaches, an award-winning vineyard, verdant wetlands and four very exclusive and unique residences, as visited by former US President Barack Obama earlier this year. All offering stunning views, these dream holiday homes are perfect for groups from four to eight people. Your unforgettable escape includes daily breakfast provisions, an indulgent dining experience curated by a private chef in the comfort of your residence on one evening of your stay, a cheese platter, daily The Landing wine and much more.
offer_address: 623 Rangihoua Road, Purerua Peninsula, Bay of Islands 0294, New Zealand

title: Award-Winning Secluded New Zealand Escape
description: A secluded nirvana awaits you at New Zealand’s Eagles Nest resort - awarded the World’s #1 Boutique Villa Resort in the 2017 World Travel Awards. Indulge in five-star luxury amid the gorgeous backdrop of the famed Bay of Islands and experience a truly magical escape with daily self service, in-villa breakfast, NZ$650 credit per villa to be used on food and activities, daily fresh fruit platter and a bottle of wine on arrival.
offer_address: 60 Tapeka Road, Russell 0242, Bay of Islands, New Zealand

title: Boutique Adults-Only Stay with Breathtaking Bay of Islands Views
description: Escape real life for the unique beauty of Donkey Bay Inn, your peaceful adults-only sanctuary in New Zealand’s Bay of Islands. An architectural masterpiece surrounded by breathtaking ocean views, it will soon become clear that there is no other property quite like Donkey Bay Inn. Included in this one-of-a-kind escape is a bottle of wine on arrival made from the grapes at the owner's very own vineyard, and a full continental breakfast every morning.
offer_address: 38 Long Beach Rd, Russell 0202, New Zealand

title: Ocean-View Bay of Islands Luxury Apartment Stay
description:
Escape your everyday and watch the world go by from your little slice of New Zealand paradise at Marina Cove Boutique Luxury Accommodation. Tucked away in Opua, the gateway to the Bay of Islands, these self-contained apartments offer a secluded sanctuary where you can truly unwind, with a backdrop of breathtaking 180-degree ocean views and a soundtrack of birdsong.

Embrace the serenity from your private deck, complete with BBQ set-up, or head out to explore the spectacular landscapes - with white-sand beaches, picturesque coastal walkways, historic harbours and big-game fishing all within reach, you’ll find plenty on your doorstep.
offer_address: 7 English Bay Rd, Opua 0200, New Zealand
